mainText:
Today is a sad day for geeks everywhere. I still have my plush  
smackamac that my father gave to me as a little girl. we never owned  
anything other than a apple product and in our home we were always  
"early adopters". Steve Jobs is a representation of being fearless, a  
dreamer and even of second chances. At the age of 27 being born in the  
year of Macintosh 1984 my life will always be affected and changed  
because of Steve Jobs.
Thank you for all of your contributions.
author: Akilah
